title: Cosmic Portfolio
description: The immersive 3D experience you are exploring right now. Built with React.ts, Framer Motion, Tailwind CSS, and custom WebGL shaders for high-performance interactive visuals.

title: VanLife
description: A full-stack van rental platform allowing users to explore and book travel vans. Powered by React Router for seamless navigation and Firebase for real-time database and authentication.

title: Chef Claude
description: An AI-powered culinary assistant that helps users generate recipes from available ingredients. Developed using React.js with robust API fetching and state management.

title: KFC Landing Page
description: A pixel-perfect functional clone of the KFC interface. Built entirely with Vanilla JavaScript and CSS to master fundamental DOM manipulation and responsive layout techniques.

title: Old Portfolio
description: My previous developer portfolio. Built with standard React and CSS, it represents my journey in component-based architecture before migrating to WebGL-enhanced interfaces.
